level.text: A member may resign as a member in accordance with the governing principles. In the absence of applicable governing principles, a member may resign at any time.

Unless the governing principles provide otherwise, resignation of a member shall not relieve the member from any unpaid capital contribution, dues, assessments, fees, or other obligation incurred or commitment made by the member before resignation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 20 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act).
